name: Ninja Samurai Girls Vs Zombies (a puzzle action level game)
name_original: Ninja Samurai Girls Vs Zombies (a puzzle action level game)
description:
Kill zombies and save the world with hot ninja babes, what more could you ask for!
- Play through hundreds of actions packed puzzle style levels.
- Splat zombies in to pieces with your ninja stars.
- Unlock new weapons and ninja skills.
- Test your brain and your skill to the max.

Download it now while it's free and become a ninja babe master!
